title: LoL and kids
body:
Wife gave birth to my beautiful daughter last November. Wife and daughter went to Korea to visit in-laws from May to June, during which time I binge-played LoL. Haven't played since they got back in June.

If you have dreams of becoming the next Faker, just know that children aren't conducive to a career in e-sports. Why am I posting this? Dunno, bored at work, LoL Worlds giving me an itch I can't scratch.

Having said that, God, my daughter is the single-most beautiful thing I've ever seen. I live to make her laugh. It's all true. That loopiness that takes over once you become a parent, it's all true.

Just to throw in some toxicity. Please, Bronzies need not comment. or post, or play, or... Bronzies need to be given their own special forum and server.
